content:
IssuedTokenServiceElement Class

In this Article

Represents a configuration element that specifies the token issued as a service credential. This class cannot be inherited.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class IssuedTokenServiceElement : System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
  • IssuedTokenServiceElement

Constructors summary

IssuedTokenServiceElement()

Initializes a new instance of the IssuedTokenServiceElement class.

Properties summary

AllowedAudienceUris

Gets a collection of audience URIs that are allowed in the element.
AllowUntrustedRsaIssuers

Gets or sets a value that specifies whether untrusted RSA certificate issuers are allowed.
AudienceUriMode

Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the SamlSecurityToken security token's SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition should be validated.
CertificateValidationMode

Gets or sets the certificate validation mode.
CustomCertificateValidatorType

Gets or sets the type and assembly used to validate a custom type.
KnownCertificates

Gets a collection of configuration elements that specify certificates issued by a trusted issuer.
Properties
RevocationMode

Gets or sets the revocation mode that specifies whether a revocation check occurs, and if it is performed online or offline.
SamlSerializerType

Gets or sets the type of SamlSerializer that is used for the service credential.
TrustedStoreLocation

Gets or sets the location of the X.509 certificate store.

Methods summary

Copy(IssuedTokenServiceElement)

Copies the content of the specified configuration element to this IssuedTokenServiceElement.

Constructors

  • IssuedTokenServiceElement()

    Initializes a new instance of the IssuedTokenServiceElement class.

    public IssuedTokenServiceElement ();

Properties

  • AllowedAudienceUris

    Gets a collection of audience URIs that are allowed in the element.

    public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AllowedAudienceUriElementCollection AllowedAudienceUris { get; }

    Property Value

    • AllowedAudienceUriElementCollection

      A collection of audience URIs that are allowed in the element.

    Remarks

    For more information on this property, see <allowedAudienceUris>

  • AllowUntrustedRsaIssuers

    Gets or sets a value that specifies whether untrusted RSA certificate issuers are allowed.

    public bool AllowUntrustedRsaIssuers { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if untrusted RSA certificate issuers are accepted; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    Certificates are signed by certification authorities (CAs) to verify authenticity. An untrusted issuer is a CA that is not specified to be trusted to sign certificates.

  • AudienceUriMode

    Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the SamlSecurityToken security token's SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition should be validated.

    public System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode AudienceUriMode { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • AudienceUriMode

      A valid value of AudienceUriMode that specifies whether the SamlSecurityToken security token's SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition should be validated.

  • CertificateValidationMode

    Gets or sets the certificate validation mode.

    public System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode CertificateValidationMode { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • X509CertificateValidationMode

      A valid value of X509CertificateValidationMode. If set to X509CertificateValidationMode, then a customCertificateValidator must also be supplied. The default is X509CertificateValidationMode.

  • CustomCertificateValidatorType

    Gets or sets the type and assembly used to validate a custom type.

    public string CustomCertificateValidatorType { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The type and assembly used to validate a custom type.

  • KnownCertificates

    Gets a collection of configuration elements that specify certificates issued by a trusted issuer.

    public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509CertificateTrustedIssuerElementCollection KnownCertificates { get; }

    Property Value

    • X509CertificateTrustedIssuerElementCollection

      A collection of configuration elements that specify certificates issued by a trusted issuer.

  • Properties
    protected override System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection Properties { get; }

    Property Value

    • ConfigurationPropertyCollection

      To be added.

  • RevocationMode

    Gets or sets the revocation mode that specifies whether a revocation check occurs, and if it is performed online or offline.

    public System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode RevocationMode { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • X509RevocationMode

      The revocation mode.

  • SamlSerializerType

    Gets or sets the type of SamlSerializer that is used for the service credential.

    public string SamlSerializerType { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The type of SamlSerializer that is used for the service credential.

  • TrustedStoreLocation

    Gets or sets the location of the X.509 certificate store.

    public System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation TrustedStoreLocation { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • StoreLocation

      A valid value of StoreLocation.

Methods

  • Copy(IssuedTokenServiceElement)

    Copies the content of the specified configuration element to this IssuedTokenServiceElement.

    public void Copy (System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IssuedTokenServiceElement from);

    Parameters

    • from
      IssuedTokenServiceElement

      A configuration element to copy from.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      from is null or empty.

    • ConfigurationErrorsException

      The configuration file is read-only.
